APP_DESCRIPTION: The platform of the European Commission for Islamic Centers is the easiest and ideal solution to deliver the donor to the needy in various regions through a safe and transparent donation process.
PROJECT_DESCRIPTION: Choose the appropriate project to donate to and that suits you
MONEY_DESCRIPTION: Choose the amount you want to donate
PAYMENT_METHODS_DESCRIPTION: Choose the appropriate payment method for you to donate
PROJECTS_HEADER_DESCRIPTION: Various donation opportunities that create a sustainable impact and achieve a wide social impact for the neediest cases.
ORGANISATION_NAME: European Organization of the Islamic Centers
NAME: Name
ORGANISATION_DESCRIPTION: It is an Organization specialized within caring of the Islamic Centers affairs in Europe. Through the initiative of some imminent religious personalities from Europe, the Organization was established in accordance with the Article 60 and all what follows from the Swiss Civil Code, related to the establishment of associations. It is an independent and nongovernmental voluntary charitable association that leads to work according to a clear vision and previously established aims and steps, and declared means.
VISION_DESCRIPTION: Excellence au service des centres islamiques pour les moderniser et développer leurs performances.
MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: Améliorer le rôle des centres islamiques en Europe, développer leurs moyens et élargir leur champ d'action, pour répondre aux besoins et aux aspirations des musulmans européens et jouer un rôle de premier plan au sein des institutions de la société civile européenne.
GOAL_DESCRIPTION: Prendre soin des centres islamiques et les accompagner dans leur développement et leur modernisation.
